title: Explore ClinicalTrials.gov data from R
text: Working status ✓ (18-01-2024). Install devtools::install_github("AdlCruz/rctexplorer") Depends rctapi.

title: Explore ClinicalTrials.gov data from R
text: data <- set_app_input(search_expr = "psoriatic arthritis", fields = for_explorer, max_studies = 500)

title: Explore ClinicalTrials.gov data from R
text: launch_explorer(data) degree flexiblity application also attempt launch dataframe argument. example, dataframe coming data <- rctapi::get_study_fields().

title: Explore ClinicalTrials.gov data from R
text: Inside application different tabs allow user interact dataframe. Help tab marked “?” NOTE: package includes little internal error handling.

text: search_expr string following querying guidelines https://clinicaltrials.gov/api/gui/ref/syntax https://clinicaltrials.gov/api/gui/ref/expr fields character vector field names. explorer optimised work default list 'for_explorer' found package "rctapi". max_studies number indicating many studies match search expression returned.
